Text.val: @Created: 04-DEC-2001
@Author: AS (A.Sedlmeier)
08.05.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
04-DEC-2001 AS initial revision
05-DEC-2001 AS added parameter pi.async to support queues (async
+ processing of xml files)
10-DEC-2001 AS added "mangling" (replacement of special XML characters
25-APR-2002 SH modified errorhandling of IOCOPY if pi.async = TRUE
15.05.2002 SH If CSCRIPT.EXE or WSCRIPT.EXE the pi.xml2send has to be put within
- double qoutes
25.03.2002 JJ SCR2221 added call GB007/GB722 if copy fails on AS400
16.06.2003 AS putput of additional error information before UFB523 goes to MSGW
02.12.2003 AS SCR #4906 if running on AS/400, the IOCOPY is replaced by
remote CPY command to get extended error message (CPF error)
03.12.2003 AS fixed bug which made UFB523 call remote command (AS/400 CPY)
even when running on Windows
26.08.2004 LB Change Data authority of the xml2tamino IFS file SCR # 6412
GB527 sends a SOAP message (to Tamino).
Note: Actually this programs merges a VB script file and starts that
with cscript.exe. This is because MGSOAP.DLL currently has a COM
interface only. As soon as MGSOAP externalizes its functionality by
"standard DLL functions", too, we'll call these functions directly.
the (temporary) script (will be pi.xml2send + '.vbs') ...
If running on AS400 and copy fails log error an turn job to MSGW
check for some faulty conditions. Look into doc for details ...
immediate processing; generate .vbs and send to tamino ....
merge .vbs with instanciation of mgsoap objects ...
... and execute that script with windows scripting host (cscript)
async processing.
Note: SHOULD BE ABLE TO RUN ON AS/400
AVOID ANY WINDOWS RELATED STUFF. IFS (UNC) ONLY FOR FILES
get translated queuedirectory in OS-FORMAT
async processing, copy to GNRD queue directory
on AS/400 we use remote CPY command to copy ...
Change Authority

Text.valUnicode: Since this is a template/proxy program only ... it does not make any sense to call it ...
